snippet: After no deal emerged from weeks of talks, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said he would call a Nov. 1 vote to break the impasse among the four main political parties.
abstract: Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan announces new election, to be held on Nov 1, to break impasse among country's four main political parties.
lead_paragraph: After no deal emerged from weeks of talks, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said he would call a Nov. 1 vote to break the impasse among the four main political parties.

headline.main: President Erdogan of Turkey to Call for New Election
headline.print_headline: President of Turkey Plans to Call New Election
